headline: Supernus makes depression drug play with $795m Sage buyout
summary: After Biogen failed with a takeover bid in January, Supernus has swooped in to acquire the postpartum depression pill developer.

raw.headline: Supernus makes depression drug play with $795m Sage buyout
raw.summary: After Biogen failed with a takeover bid in January, Supernus has swooped in to acquire the postpartum depression pill developer.

headline: Beleaguered Sage Snapped Up In Deal Worth Up To $561 Million
summary: Supernus Pharmaceuticals agreed Monday to buy beleaguered biotech Sage Therapeutics in a deal worth up to $561 million.

raw.headline: Beleaguered Sage Snapped Up In Deal Worth Up To $561 Million
raw.summary: Supernus Pharmaceuticals agreed Monday to buy beleaguered biotech Sage Therapeutics in a deal worth up to $561 million.

headline: Sage, following Setbacks, to sell to Supernus for $561M
summary: In what one analyst described as an “unremarkable” outcome, the brain drug developer is being acquired for just $8.50 per share, plus non-guaranteed additional payouts, after a series of stumbles that depressed its stock price.

raw.headline: Sage, following Setbacks, to sell to Supernus for $561M

headline: Supernus enters depression drug market with up to $795 million Sage deal
summary: Supernus Pharmaceuticalswill acquire Sage Therapeutics in a deal worth up to$795 million, gaining access to the only postpartum depressionpill approved in the United States, the companies said...
